text: mattu avara (visvasigala) manas'sugalalli paraspara pritiyannu belesidavanu avane. Nivu bhumiyallina sampurna sampattannu vyayisiddaru avara manas'sugalalli paraspara pritiyannu belesalu nimage sadhyavaguttiralilla. Nijakku allahane avara naduve pritiyannu belesidanu. Khanditavagiyu avanu atyanta prabalanu yuktivantanu agiruvanu
